content: Hello, an account I used before was closed. Do you know how I can reopen it?
I assume you are referring to @İmran Tanrikolu? Note that our Zulip policy says you may only use one account
This topic was moved here from #general > help for account by Eric Wieser.

There is also İmran Tanrikolu and İmran Tanrikolu.
We would indeed like you to only use 1 account, and it is unacceptable to make a new account just to avoid a ban.
Lastly, make sure you following the contributor guidelines: https://leanprover-community.github.io/meet.html#community-guidelines

If you want, we can reinstate one of these other accounts, and ban İmran Tanq instead (so that you have 1 active account).
@İmran Tanq (I'm pinging you to ensure that you see that we've moved your messsage)

Floris van Doorn dedi:

There is also İmran Tanrikolu and İmran Tanrikolu.
We would indeed like you to only use 1 account, and it is unacceptable to make a new account just to avoid a ban.
Lastly, make sure you following the contributor guidelines: https://leanprover-community.github.io/meet.html#community-guidelines

If you want, we can reinstate one of these other accounts, and ban İmran Tanq instead (so that you have 1 active account).

If you have the possibility to close this account and reopen my other accounts, that would be great. You can reopen the İmran Tanrikolu account. Thank you.

Eric Wieser dedi:

I assume you are referring to İmran Tanrikolu? Note that our Zulip policy says you may only use one account

If you have the possibility to close this account and reopen my other accounts, that would be great. You can reopen the İmran Tanrikolu account. Thank you.
I need to access an account I used before to retrieve some information from it. Could an administrator please help me?
A message was moved here from #general > I want to have my closed account reopened by Eric Wieser.
Pretty clearly the answer is going to be "no unless you actually give the name of the account".
